translations: v．授权，批准：给予某人或某事物权力或许可，使其具有合法性。
· The government authorizes the use of military force.

sentences.sentence: The president authorizes the judicious use of military force to protect our citizens.
sentences.translation: 总统授权明智动用军队来保护我们的公民。

sentences.sentence: This new contract authorizes Boeing to start work on Sustainment Block 16 (SB 16).
sentences.translation: 这份新合同授权波音公司开始对第16保障区块(SB 16)的工作。

sentences.sentence: ProcessPayment: Posts and authorizes the payment.
